word: I READ THIS TO THE BOARD WHEN I GOT IT, AND I DID NOT SUPPOSE THAT WHAT IS OCCURRING THIS EVENING WOULD EVER COME BY MY HAVING TO READ THIS AGAIN TO THE BOARD. I DID NOT SUPPOSE THAT I WOULD EVER HAVE TO COME UP TO THE BOARD WITH THIS KIND OF WORK. I AM SORRY IT HAS TO BE DONE; BUT SINCE IT HAS TO BE DONE, I AM GLAD TO DO IT.
